Spells-Primal -- Female Nephilim Human Druid: 10
Strength: +3 Dexterity: +2 Constitution: +3 Intelligence: +2 Wisdom: +3 Charisma: +4
Background: Charlatan Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 9655/10000 Level: 10 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 12 from any)
Forest Passage: Moves normally over difficult terrain caused by plants or fungi
Features/Skills
Feat Count: Ancestry: 3; Class: 6; General: 3; Skill: 5 Selectable Feature Count: Druid (Order); Human (Heritage)

Leaf: Has the Leshy Familiar feature

Voice Of Nature: Class Feat (Choose 1 from Animal Empathy, Plant Empathy)
Anathema: May not perform acts or use spells prohibited by druidic order
Leshy Familiar: Has a Tiny plant or fungus familiar
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Nephilim Heritage: Has the nephilim trait and can take nephilim ancestry feats
Perception: +17 (wisdom; expert)

Assurance (Engineering Lore): Can take an automatic 28 on Engineering Lore checks
Assurance (Nature): Can take an automatic 22 on Nature checks
Charming Liar: Critical success on a Lie improves a target's attitude by 1 step once per conversation
Lengthy Diversion: Can remain hidden after a Create A Diversion attempt critically succeeds
No Cause For Alarm: Successful Diplomacy reduces frightened levels by 1 in a 10' emanation, or by 2 on a critical success
Sense Allies: R60' Willing undetected allies are hidden instead and can be targeted with a DC 5 flat check
Wildsong: Knows a druid-specific language
Combat
Hit Points: 118 Armor Class: 25 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Druid: 25 (wisdom; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Blowgun (+14 1 P R20'; dexterity; trained); Light Mace (+15 1d4+3 B; strength; trained); Sling (+14 1d6+1 B R50'; dexterity; trained)

Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage

Magic
Spell Slots: P1: 3; P2: 3; P3: 3; P4: 3; P5: 3; PC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Primal: +17 (wisdom; expert) Spell DC: Primal: 27 (wisdom; expert)
Spells:
Acid Grip (P2): (2) R120' Inflicts 2d8 HP acid, 1d6 HP persistent acid, and -10' Speed (save Reflex inflicts half initial HP only and moves the target 5'; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial HP and moves the target 20') (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 HP initial and +1d6 HP persistent)
Aerial Form (P4): (2) Self becomes a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Acrobatics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Acrobatics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Acrobatics)
Air Bubble (P1): (R) R60' Allows target to breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Alarm (P1): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Animal Form (P2): (2) Self becomes a Medium animal with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 26, +9 attack, +1 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +9 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 3rd gives 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 27, +14 attack, +5 damage, +14 Athletics; 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +16 attack, +9 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +18 attack, +7 damage with double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Animal Messenger (P2): (1 min) R120' Target Tiny animal carries a small object or note to a specified destination for up to 24 hr
Animal Vision (P3): (1 min) R120' Allows self to share the target animal's senses (save Will negates) for 1 hr
Ant Haul (P1): (2) Touched can carry +3 Bulk without encumbrance and +6 Bulk maximum for 8 hr
Aqueous Orb (P3): (2) R60' 10' sphere extinguishes normal fires, attempts to counteract magical fires, and engulfs Large or smaller creatures until they succeed on an Escape or DC 10 Swim check (save Reflex negates; critical failure disallows Swim) while sustained for up to 1 min
Arctic Rift (P8): (2) R120' Inflicts 12d8 HP cold and slowed 1 for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and slowed 1 until ice with 60 HP and Hardness 5 is cleared) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d8 HP and gives ice +5 HP)
Banishment (P5): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bestial Curse (P4): (2) Touched suffers clumsy 1, requires a successful DC 5 flat check for manipulate actions, and gains a claw, hoof, horn, or jaws Strike for 1 hr (save Fortitude only inflicts clumsy 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects are permanent)
Blanket Of Stars (P6): (2) Gives self +2 Stealth to Hide and Sneak and invisibility or concealment when still or moving beneath a starry sky, and inflicts dazzled for 1 rd on adjacent creatures (save Will negates; critical failure also inflicts confused
Blazing Bolt (P2): (1) R60' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP fire, or double on a critical success; using 2 or 3 actions increases the damage to 4d6 HP fire and attacks 2 or 3 targets (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP, or +2d6 HP with 2 or 3 actions)
Blinding Fury (P6): (R) R60' Makes self hidden from the triggering attacker for 1 rd after every damaging attack for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects are permanent and also affect the target's perception of other creatures)
Blindness (P3): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Blister (P5): (2) R60' Allows self to create 2 15' cones from target that each inflict 7d6 HP acid (save basic Fortitude) anytime within 1 min (save Fortitude allows 1 cone; critical success negates; critical failure allows 4 cones)
Breathe Fire (P1): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Cataclysm (P10): (2) R1000' 60' burst inflicts 3d10 HP each acid, bludgeoning 3 times, cold, electricity, and fire, ignoring resistance 10 (save basic Reflex)
Caustic Blast (PC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid, plus 1 HP persistent acid on a critical success, and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+3 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+3 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+3 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+3 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)
Chain Lightning (P6): (2) R500' Inflicts 8d12 HP electricity on a chain of targets, jumping up to 30' between each (save basic Reflex; critical success ends the chain) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Chameleon Coat (P5): (3) R15' 8 targets gain +3 Stealth and Hide for 10 min; shedding gear or clothes ends the spell for that target (heightened 6th makes critical failures on Sneak vs. creatures within 30' into normal failures; 8th gives +4 Stealth and Hide)
Charm (P1): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Chilling Spray (P1): (2) 15' code inflicts 2d4 HP cold and -5' Speed for 2 rd (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and -10' Speed)
Chroma Leach (P4): (2) Touched suffers enfeebled 2 for 1 min and drained 1 and must succeed on a Will save to move for 1 rd (save Fortitude only inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 2 permanently and drained 2)
Cleanse Affliction (P2): (2) Reduces the stage of a curse, disease, or poison affecting touched by 1 (heightened 3rd attempts to counteract a disease or poison; 4th attempts to counteract a curse, disease, or poison)
Cleanse Cuisine (P1): (2) R10' Enhances or removes contaminants from 1 cubic foot of food and drink (heightened +2 affects +1 cubic foot)
Clear Mind (P2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. 1 fleeing, frightened, or stupefied effect affecting touched (heightened 4th can counteract confused, controlled, or slows; 6th can counteract doomed; 8th can counteract stunned)
Control Water (P5): (2) R500' Raises or lowers water by 10' and slows water creatures for 1 hr (save Fortitude negates) in a 50'x50' area
Cornucopia (P1 Foc): (2) Eating the touched piece of produce within 10 min restores 1d6+4 HP; 6 pieces also count as a full meal (heightened +1 affects +1 piece)
Corrosive Muck (P5): (2) R120' 2 10' bursts inflict greater difficult terrain and 8d6 HP acid for 1 min (save basic Reflex) (heightened +2 creates another 10' burst)
Countless Eyes (P4): (2) Touched can see in all directions, cannot be flanked, and critically succeeds on a Seek success for 1 min
Crashing Wave (P3): (2) 30' cone inflicts 6d6 HP bludgeoning and extinguishes non-magical fires (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Create Food (P2): (1 hr) R30' Creates food for 6 Medium creatures that lasts for 1 day (heightened 4th creates food for 12; 6th creates food for 50; 8th creates food for 200)
Create Water (P1): (2) Creates 2 gallons of water that last for 1 day
Creation (P4): (1 min) R0' Creates an object of up to 5 cubic feet made of earth or vegetable matter that lasts for 1 hr (heightened 5th object can include metal and common minerals)
Curse Of Lost Time (P3): (2) Touched object suffers 4d6 HP, becomes shoddy, cannot be repaired, and counteracts magical attempts to repair it (save Fortitude by bearer negates); touched construct suffers 4d6 HP and clumsy 1, enfeebled 1, cannot be repaired, and counteracts magical attempts to repair it for 1 hr (save basic Fortitude; critical failure makes effects permanent); touched living creature suffers clumsy 1 and enfeebled 1 for 1 hr (save Fortitude effects last 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure makes effects permanent)
Cursed Metamorphosis (P6): (2) R30' Transforms the target's form into a harmless animal for 1 min, allowing a new save to revert each rd (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure transforms permanently and also affects the target's mind)
Darkvision (P2): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Deafness (P2): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Desiccate (P8): (2) Targets in a 500' radius suffer 10d10 HP void (save basic Fortitude; plant and water creatures worsen save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Detect Magic (PC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Poison (P1): (2) R30' Reveals whether the target creature or object is venomous or poisoned (heightened 2nd reveals the number and types of poison)
Detonate Magic (P9): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to convert the target magic into an explosion that inflicts 8d6 HP force (save basic Reflex)
Dinosaur Form (P4): (2) Self becomes a Large dinosaur with 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +16 attack, +9 damage, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +18 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' or 20' reach, 20 temporary HP, +18 attack, +6 damage with double damage dice, +21 Athletics; 7th becomes a Gargantuan creature with 20' or 25' reach, Armor Class 31, 25 temporary HP, +25 attack, +15 damage with double damage dice, +25 Athletics)
Dismantle (P2): (2) Touched object disassembles into its components for 1 min, then reassembles itself (heightened 4th effects last for 10 min; 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Dispel Magic (P2): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dragon Form (P6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Earthbind (P3): (2) R120' Brings a flying target to the ground and prevents flight and levitation for 1 rd (save Fortitude grounds target but does not prevent flight; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 min)
Earthquake (P8): (2) R500' 60' burst inflicts difficult terrain, -2 attacks, Armor Class, and skill checks, a 40' fall (save Reflex negates), and structure collapse that inflicts 11d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Reflex inflicts half HP and knocked prone; critical success inflicts half HP only; critical failure causes the fall save to fail) (heightened 10th increases range to a half mile and effect area to a quarter-mile burst)
Eclipse Burst (P7): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP void to living creatures (save Reflex; inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP void)
Electric Arc (PC1): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d4 electricity on 1 or 2 targets (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Elemental Form (P5): (2) Self becomes a Medium elemental with 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 29, +18 attack, +9 damage, darkvision, +20 Acrobatics (air, fire, or metal) or Athletics (earth, water, or wood) modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +23 attack, +13 damage, +23 Acrobatics or Athletics; 7th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +25 attack, +11 damage and double damage dice, and +25 Acrobatics or Athletics)
Energy Aegis (P7): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, vitality, void, and sonic damage until next daily prep (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enlarge (P2): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Large, gaining +5' reach, +2 melee damage, and clumsy 1 for 5 min (heightened 4th target becomes Huge, gaining +10' reach and +4 melee damage; 8th affects 10 creatures)
Entangling Flora (P2): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 min (save Reflex inflicts difficult terrain only; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd)
Environmental Endurance (P2): (10 min) Protects touched from severe cold or heat until next daily prep (heightened 3rd protects from both cold and heat; 5th protects from extreme cold and heat)
Everlight (P2): (3) Touched gemstone emits 20' bright light until dismissed
Execute (P7): (2) R30' Target suffers 70 HP void, dying at 0 HP (save basic Fortitudeheightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)

Feather Fall (P1): (R) R60' Falling target slows to 60' per rd and suffers no falling damage for 1 min or until landing
Feet To Fins (P3): (2) Willing touched can swim at full Speed but slows to 5' on land for 10 min (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Field Of Life (P6): (2) R30' 20' burst restores 1d8 HP per rd to living and inflicts 1d8 HP vitality per rd to undead while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 8th restores and inflicts 1d10 HP; 9th restores and inflicts 1d12 HP)
Fiery Body (P7): (2) Self gains fire immunity and resistance 10 to precision damage, suffers weakness 5 to cold and water, inflicts 3d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +1d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks and an additional die of damage on fire spells, can cast Ignite using 1 action as an innate spell, gains a 40' fly Speed, and does not need to breathe for 1 min (heightened 9th inflicts 4d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +2d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks, and increases fly Speed to 60')
Final Sacrifice (P2): (2) R120' Explosion of target minion slays it and inflicts 6d6 HP fire, or 6d6 HP cold if the minion is a cold or water creature, in a 20' radius (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Fire Shield (P4): (2) Hovering shield with Hardness 10 and 40 HP gives self cold resistance 5 and immunity to severe environmental cold and inflicts 2d6 HP fire on melee attackers for 1 min (heightened +2 shield has +10 HP, gives cold resistance +5, and inflicts +1d6 HP)

Fly (P4): (2) Touched gains a fly Speed of the greater of its Speed or 20' for 5 min (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr)
Frostbite (PC1): (2) R60' Inflicts 2d4 HP cold (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts weakness 1 to bludgeoning for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP and weakness +1 to bludgeoning)
Fungal Infestation (P2): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP persistent poison and weakness 1 to fire and slashing while the persistent damage lasts (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and weakness 2) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d6 HP and increases weakness by 1, or by 2 on critical failure)
Gale Blast (PC1): (2) 5' emanation inflicts 1d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and a 10' push) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Gaseous Form (P4): (2) Touched becomes vapor with resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, proficiency modifier for unarmored defense, and 10' fly Speed for 5 min or until the target or self ends the spell
Gecko Grip (P2): (2) Touched gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Goblin Pox (P1): (2) Touched suffers stage 1 goblin pox, which inflicts sickened 1 for 1 rd; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict sickened 1 and slowed 1 for 1 rd at stage 2, and incurably sickened 1 for 1 dy at stage 3 (save Fortitude inflicts sickened 1 only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2; goblins and goblin dogs are immune)
Gouging Claw (PC1): (2) Melee spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP slashing or piercing, plus 2 HP persistent bleed, or double both on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP initial and +1 persistent bleed)
Grease (P1): (2) R30' 4 5' squares cause falls, or 1 target object inflicts a -2 penalty to checks, for 1 min (save Reflex or Acrobatics negates; critical failure causes the holder to drop the target object)
Grisly Growths (P5): (2) R60' Inflicts 10d6 HP piercing on target (save basic Fortitude) and, unless the target critically succeeds, sickened 1 on creatures within 30' (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts sickened 2; afterwards immune for 1 hr) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Guidance (PC1): (1) R30' Target gains +1 on an attack, Perception, save, or skill check within 1 rd once per target per hr
Gust Of Wind (P1): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against the wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning)
Haste (P3): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Heal (P1): (1) Touched (2 or 3 actions gives R30' or a 30' emanation) regains 1d8 HP, or 1d8+8 HP with 2 actions; undead instead suffer 1d8 HP (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 restores or inflicts +1d8 HP; restores +8 HP with 2 actions)
Holy Light (P3): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 5d6 HP fire, plus 5d6 HP spirit to unholy creatures (critical success inflicts double HP), and attempts to counteract magical darkness (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP fire and spirit)
Howling Blizzard (P5): (2) 60' cone (using 3 actions gives R500' and a 30' burst) inflicts 10d6 HP cold (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Humanoid Form (P2): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Hydraulic Push (P1): (2) R60' Spell attack inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push, or 6d6 HP bludgeoning and a 10' push with a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Hydraulic Torrent (P4): (2) 60' line inflicts 8d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push (save basic Fortitude; success negates push; critical failure doubles push distance)
Ice Storm (P4): (3) R120' 20' burst (or 2 20' bursts outdoors) inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 2d8 HP cold, as well as 2 HP cold and difficult terrain (save basic Reflex) while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +2 inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning, +1d8 HP cold, and +1 cold while sustained)
Ignition (PC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 2d4 HP (2d6 HP if a melee attack) fire, or double HP plus 1d4 HP persistent fire on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Impaling Spike (P5): (2) R30' Inflicts 8d6 HP piercing from cold iron and immobilized (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and off-guard) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Implosion (P9): (2) R30' Inflicts 75 HP on 1 target each rd while sustained for up to 1 min; a target cannot be affected twice by a single casting (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)
Indestructibility (P10): (2) Gives self immunity to harm for 1 rd
Insect Form (P3): (2) Self becomes a Medium bug with 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +13 attack, +2 damage, low-light vision, +13 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, +16 attack, +6 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, +18 attack, +2 damage and double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Interplanar Teleport (P7): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Jump (P1): (1) Allows self to jump 30' immediately (heightened 3rd affects touched, and effects last for 1 min)
Know The Way (PC1): (2) Reveals which direction is north (heightened 3rd reveals direction to a location visited in the past week; 7th reveals direction to a familiar location)
Leaden Steps (P1): (2) R30' Inflicts encumbered and weakness 2 to electricity while sustained for up to 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until the end of the next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts weakness 3 to electricity) (heightened +1 inflicts weakness +1)
Lifewood Cage (P7): (3) R30' 20' wooden cube with half-inch gaps between bars (AC 10, Hardness 20, 40 HP, weakness 5 to void) traps creatures while sustained for up to 1 min (save Reflex negates)
Light (PC1): (2) R120' Orb lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lightning Bolt (P3): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Lightning Storm (P5): (3) R120' 20' burst (or 2 20' burst outdoors) inflicts 4d12 HP electricity in a vertical line each rd while sustained for up to 1 min (save basic Reflex) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Live Wire (PC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d4 HP slashing and 1d4 HP electricity, double HP and 1d4 persistent electricity on a critical success, or 1d4 HP electricity only on failure (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP slashing, electricity, and persistent electricity)
Mad Monkeys (P3): (2) R30' Spiritual monkeys in a 5' burst obey self order to Steal, screech to deafen for 1 rd (save Fortitude negates; critical failure deafens for 1 min), or interfere with manipulate actions for 1 rd (save Reflex negates; critical failure extends until the spell ends; a successful DC 5 flat check allows a specific manipulate action) while sustained for up to 1 min
Magic Passage (P5): (2) Creates a 5'x10'x10' tunnel in wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr (heightened 7th the tunnel extends 20', appears as normal wall, and can be entered only using a password or trigger)
Mariner's Curse (P5): (2) Touched suffers incurable sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on open water, until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts curable sickened 1; critical success negates; critical success inflicts incurable sickened 2)
Marvelous Mount (P2): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (Armor Class 25, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can be ridden only by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 3rd mount can walk on water; 4th mount has 60' Speed; 5th mount can also fly for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and can fly)
Mask Of Terror (P7): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Massacre (P9): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP void on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 void on all within the line, including self (save Fortitude inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save Fortitude 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Mending (P1): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell rank to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Metamorphosis (P9): (2) Replicates any known polymorph spell of up to 8th rank for 1 min
Migration (P8): (10 min) Self and 5 touched become clouds that can move 20 MPH for 8 hr; attacking or spellcasting ends the spell
Mirage (P4): (10 min) R500' 50' burst illusion changes the look, sound, feel, and smell of the terrain until next daily prep (heightened 5th the illusion can mask or incorporate structures)
Mist (P2): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures for 1 min
Moment Of Renewal (P8): (2) 6 touched instantly gain the effects of 24 hr of rest once per target per day
Monstrosity Form (P8): (2) Self becomes a Huge phoenix, cave worm, or sea serpent with 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +28 attack, darkvision, +30 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 9th gives 25 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +31 attack, an additional damage die, +33 Athletics)
Moon Frenzy (P5): (2) R30' 5 willing targets gain 5 temporary HP, +10' Speed, fangs and claws that inflict 2d8 HP piercing and 2d6 HP slashing plus 1d4 HP persistent bleed on a critical hit, and increase a size up to Large in full moonlight, but suffer weakness 5 to silver and prohibition of non-rage, non-Seek concentration actions, for 1 min (heightened 6th gives 10 temporary HP, inflict 3d8 HP piercing and 3d6 HP slashing, weakness 10 to silver; 10th gives 20 temporary HP, inflict 4d8 HP piercing and 4d6 HP slashing, weakness 20 to silver)
Mountain Resilience (P4): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 to non-adamantine physical damage for 20 min; each hit reduces the duration by 1 min (heightened 6th gives resistance 10; 8th gives resistance 15; 10th gives resistance 20)
Mud Pit (P1): (3) R60' 15' burst becomes muddy, inflicting difficult terrain for 1 min
Mystic Armor (P1): (2) Self gains +1 Armor Class with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 Armor Class; 8th gives +2 saves; 10th gives +3 Armor Class and saves)
Nature Incarnate (P10): (2) Self becomes a Medium green man or Gargantuan kaiju with 30 temporary HP, Armor Class 35, +34 attack, darkvision, +36 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min
Nature's Enmity (P9): (2) 500' burst inflicts -10' Speed, 2d10 slashing damage and off-guard for 1 rd (DC 8 flat check negates; save basic Reflex; critical success also negates off-guard), and loss of connection to nature and natural creatures, and failure of primal spells (DC 5 flat check negates) for 10 min
Nature's Pathway (P5): (1 min) Transports self from an adjacent tree to another within 5 miles (heightened 6th transports 50 miles; 8th transports 500 miles; 9th transports anywhere on the planet)
Nondetection (P3): (10 min) Touched gains automatic counteract attempts vs. magical divinations for 8 hr
Noxious Vapors (P1): (2) 10' emanation inflicts 1d6 HP poison (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts sickened 1) and gives concealment for 1 rd (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Oaken Resilience (P2): (2) Touched gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing and weakness 3 to fire for 10 min or until dismissed by target (heightened +2 gives +2 resistances and +3 weakness)
One With Plants (P2): (2) Self becomes a Large tree with Armor Class 20 for 8 hr or merges into plant matter for 10 min
One With Stone (P3): (2) Self becomes a block of stone with Armor Class 23 for 8 hr or merges into stone for 10 min
Peaceful Rest (P2): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Pest Cache (P1): (1) Moves companion into a pocket dimension for up to 8 hr
Pest Form (P1): (2) Self becomes a Tiny animal with Armor Class 25, 20' Speed, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +10 Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers, -4 Athletics modifier, and weakness 5 to physical damage for 10 min (heightened 4th becomes a creature with a 20' fly Speed)
Petrify (P6): (2) R120' Inflicts initial slowed 1; subsequent failed or successful saves each rd increase or decrease the degree slowed until the target is no longer slowed or becomes immobile and permanently turned to stone (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial slowed 2)
Plant Form (P5): (2) Self becomes a Large plant with 12 temporary HP, Armor Class 29, +17 attack, +11 damage, low-light vision, resistance 10 to poison, +19 Athletics modifier, and plant-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes a Huge plant with +5' reach, 24 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +21 attack, +16 damage, +22 Athletics)
Prestidigitation (PC1): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Primal Herd (P10): (2) R30' Self and 5 willing targets become Huge mammoths with 20 temporary HP, 40' Speed, low-light vision, Armor Class level + 22, a tusk attack that inflicts 4d8+19 HP piercing, a trunk attack that inflicts 4d6+16 HP bludgeoning, a foot attack that inflicts 4d6+13 HP bludgeoning, +30 Athletics modifier, and a trample action for 1 min
Protector Tree (P1): (2) R30' Creates a tree with Armor Class 10 and 10 Hit Points that redirects damage from adjacent allies to itself for 1 min; a tree that survives the spell's duration remains in place (heightened +1 gives the tree +10 Hit Points)
Puff Of Poison (PC1): (2) R10' Inflicts 1d4 HP poison and 1d4 HP persistent poison (save Fortitude inflicts half initial HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial and persistent HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Pummeling Rubble (P1): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d4 HP bludgeon and a 5' push (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and a 10' push) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP)
Punishing Winds (P8): (3) R100' 30' radius lowers flying creatures by 40', creates greater difficult terrain for flying creatures and difficult terrain for others, and requires a successful flying Acrobatics or grounded Athletics vs. DC 27 to exit while sustained for up to 1 min
Read Aura (PC1): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and gives +2 to Identify Magic on it (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Reaper's Lantern (P2): (2) Lights a 5' emanation, inflicts enfeebled 1 on undead, and negates half of healing effects on living (save Fortitude negates) for 1 min; a Sustain each turn increases the radius by 5'
Regenerate (P7): (2) Touched target regains 15 HP and regrows a damaged organ each rd for 1 min; suffering new acid or fire damage negates the effects for 1 rd (heightened 9th restores 20 HP each rd)
Remake (P10): (1 hr) R5' Fully re-creates a known object up to 5'x5'x5' from a remnant
Resist Energy (P2): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Revealing Light (P2): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 1 min (save Reflex effects last 2 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 10 min)
Revival (P10): (2) 30' radius restores 10d8+40 HP to living targets and raises dead targets with the same number of temporary HP while sustained for up to 1 min
Runic Body (P1): (2) Touched creature's unarmed attack gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Runic Weapon (P1): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Safe Passage (P3): (3) 10'x10'x60' area gives +2 Armor Class, +2 saves, and resistance 5 to damage from the terrain and environment while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 5th gives resistance 10 and extends area to 120'; 8th gives resistance 15 and extends area to 500'
Scatter Scree (PC1): (2) R30' 2 contiguous 5' cubes inflict 2d4 HP bludgeoning initial (save basic Reflex), plus difficult terrain for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Scintillating Safeguard (P6): (R) R30' Gives 5 targets resistance 10 vs. the triggering physical or energy damage (heightened +1 gives resistance +1)
Shape Stone (P4): (2) Reshapes touched 10'x10'x10' stone
Shape Wood (P2): (2) Reshapes touched 20 cubic feet of wood
Shatter (P2): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d10 HP sonic on an unattended object, ignoring Hardness up to 4 (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP and ignores +2 Hardness)
Shrink (P2): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Tiny for 5 min (heightened 6th affects 10 creatures)
Sigil (PC1): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on a touched object or creature; the mark can be scrubbed off and fades from a creature after 1 week (heightened 3rd marks a creature for 1 month; 5th marks a creature for 1 year; 7th marks a creature permanently)
Slow (P3): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets)
Sound Body (P2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a magical blinded, dazzled, deafness, enfeebled, or sickened effect affecting touched; failure that would succeed against an effect 2 ranks lower suppresses the effect for 1 rd (heightened 4th attempts to counteract drained; 8th attempts to counteract stunned)
Speak With Animals (P2): (2) Allows self to communicate with animals for 1 hr
Speak With Plants (P3): (2) Allows self to communicate with plants and fungi for 1 hr (heightened 4th effects last 8 hr
Speak With Stones (P5): (2) Allows self to converse with stone for 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last 8 hr
Spider Sting (P1): (2) Touched suffers 1d4 HP piercing and stage 1 spider venom, which inflicts 1d4 HP poison and enfeebled 1; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict an additional 1d4 HP poison and enfeebled 2 at stage 2 (save Fortitude inflicts 1d4 HP piercing and 1d4 HP poison only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2 immediately)
Spout (PC1): (2) R30' 5' cube, or a 5' burst in water, inflicts 2d4 HP bludgeoning (save basic Reflex; critical failure also inflicts off-guard until the end of the next turn) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Stabilize (PC1): (2) R30' Removes dying condition from target
Status (P2): (2) Reveals willing touched's direction, distance, and conditions until next daily prep (heightened 4th R10' affects 10 targets)
Sudden Blight (P2): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts 2d10 HP void (save basic Fortitude; creatures with disease suffer a -2 penalty), optionally plus difficult terrain from the immediate rotting of Small and Tiny non-creature plants (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Summon Animal (P1): (3) R30' A level -1 animal appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Dragon (P5): (3) R30' A level 5 dragon appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Elemental (P2): (3) R30' A level 1 elemental appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Fey (P1): (3) R30' A level -1 fey appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Giant (P5): (3) R30' A level 5 giant appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Plant Or Fungus (P1): (3) R30' A level -1 plant or fungus appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Sunburst (P7): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical darkness and inflicts 8d10 HP fire, plus 8d10 HP vitality to undead (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP fire and vitality)
Sure Footing (P2): (2) Makes a counteract attempt vs. a clumsy, grabbed, or paralysis effect affecting touched; failure that would succeed against an effect 2 ranks lower suppresses the effect for 1 rd (heightened 4th attempts to counteract immobilized or restrained; 6th attempts to counteract petrified; 8th attempts to counteract stunned)
Tailwind (P1): (2) Self gains +10' Speed for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 8 hr)
Tangle Vine (PC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts -10' Speed for 1 rd, plus immobilized for 1 rd on a critical success; a successful Escape negates (heightened 2nd effects last for 2 rd; 4th effects last for 1 min)
Tangling Creepers (P6): (3) R500' 40' burst inflicts -10' Speed, and a successful unarmed attack immobilizes 1 target for 1 rd (a successful Escape negates), each rd for 10 min
Threefold Aspect (P3): (1 min) Allows self to use a Sustain to polymorph between young adult, adult, and elderly forms for 1 min, gaining +4 Deception to pass as the selected age, for 1 min
Thunderstrike (P1): (2) R120' Inflicts 1d12 HP electricity and 1d4 HP sonic (save basic Reflex; targets in metal armor suffer -1 save and clumsy 1 for 1 rd (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP electricity and +1d4 HP sonic)
Toxic Cloud (P5): (3) R120' Creates a cloud in a 20' burst that inflicts 6d8 HP poison and moves away 10' each rd for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Tree Of Seasons (P6): (2) Creates 4 seedpods that can be thrown 30', inflicting 6d6 HP electricity, fire, poison, or cold in a 5' burst within 1 min (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Truesight (P6): (2) R60' Makes counteract checks to allow self to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Unfettered Movement (P4): (2) Relieves touched of Speed penalty effects and gives automatic success on Escape attempts vs. non-magical effects and magical effects up to the spell level for 10 min
Unfettered Pack (P7): (2) R30' 10 targets ignore environmental difficult terrain and circumstance Speed penalties for 1 hr (heightened 9th targets ignore environmental greater difficult terrain)
Vanishing Tracks (P1): (2) Increases the DC to Track self by 4 or to 27, whichever is higher, for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last for 8 hr and affect a 20' radius and 10 creatures)
Veil Of Privacy (P3): (10 min) Attempts to counteract detection, revelation, and scrying cast against the target for 8 hr
Ventriloquism (P1): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vital Beacon (P4): (1 min) Touch heals once each rd: 4d10 HP, 4d8 HP, 4d6 HP, then 4d4 HP, until expended or next daily prep (heightened +1 each touch restores +1 die)
Vitality Lash (PC1): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d6 HP positive on an undead target (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Volcanic Eruption (P7): (2) R120' 5'x80' cylinder inflicts 14d6 HP fire, a 20' descent and difficult terrain on flying creatures, and -10' Speed and clumsy 1 until a successful escape (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP), and 3d6 HP fire to creatures within 5' (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP and +1d6 HP within 5')
Vomit Swarm (P2): (2) 30' cone inflicts 2d8 HP piercing and sickened 1 (save basic Reflex also negates sickened) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Wall Of Fire (P4): (3) R120' 5'x60'x10' line or 10' radius ring inflicts 4d6 HP fire for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Flesh (P5): (2) R60' Creates a 30'x20'x3' wall of flesh, each 5' section with Armor Class 10 and 75 Hit Points, that either inflicts 2d6 HP piercing, gives self +2 Perception within the wall's line of sight, or grabs for 1 rd or until a successful Escape (save Reflex negates; critical failure grabs), for 1 min (heightened +2 gives each section +10 Hit Points and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Ice (P5): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x10'x1' wall or a 10' radius hemisphere of opaque ice with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, weakness to fire 15, and 40 HP per 10' section for 1 min; rubble from destruction inflicts 2d6 HP cold and difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +10 HP, and rubble inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Stone (P5): (3) R120' Creates a permanent 120'x20'x1" stone wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 14, and 50 HP per 10' section; rubble from destruction inflicts difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +15 HP)
Wall Of Thorns (P3): (3) R60' Creates a 60'x10'x5' bramble wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, and 20 HP per 10' section that inflicts difficult terrain and 3d4 HP piercing for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP, and each section gains +5 HP)
Wall Of Wind (P3): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x30'x5' wind wall that blocks small ammunition, inflicts -2 attack on larger ammunition, inflicts difficult terrain, and blocks flying creatures for 1 min (save Fortitude (flying creature) allows passage as difficult terrain; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a 10' push)
Water Breathing (P2): (1 min) R30' 5 targets can breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily prep)
Water Walk (P2): (2) Touched can walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures, and effects last for 1 hr)
Weapon Storm (P4): (2) Weapon swing inflicts 4 dice of damage to every creature in a 30' cone or a 10' emanation (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and critical specialization effect) (heightened +1 inflicts +1 damage die)
Web (P2): (3) R30' 10' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 rd (save Reflex or Athletics negates for 1 action; critical success negates for 1 rd; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd or until a successful Escape; successful Athletics also clears squares upon leaving) (heightened 4th extends the range to 60' and affects a 20' burst)
Wrathful Storm (P9): (3) R800' 400' burst inflicts -4 ranged attacks, greater difficult terrain for flying, and a choice each rd of 4d8 HP cold (no save), 4d10 HP bludgeoning (save basic Fortitude), 7d6 HP electricity on 10 targets (save basic Reflex), or thrown 40' (no save) while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 10th R2200' 1000' burst)
Magic Notes:
Druidic Order: Has a focus pool
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Primal)
Leaf: Knows the Cornucopia primal spell
Call Of The Wild: Can spend 10 min in concert with nature to replace a prepared spell with Summon Animal or Summon Plant Or Fungus of the same rank
Druid Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the primal tradition
Floral Restoration: (1) Draws on 15' sq of plant life to regain 5d8 HP and 1 Focus Point once per day
Healing Transformation: (1) Subsequent non-cantrip polymorph spell restores 1d6 Hit Points per spell rank
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 10 to energy
Raise Menhir: (2) R30' 15' radius gives creatures +2 saves vs. a choice of arcane, divine, or occult effects while sustained up to 1 min
